Posts.Content: Whats the best thing to have apart from water that will stop me from being dyhydrated as woke up night before to go loo and felt light headed and dizzy checked temp and it was just low than 36 rang emergency chemo line and they said have a drunk loads and i said yeah before bed.she said drink more and if no change in hour ring back luckly just over an hour my temp went abit better and went to 36.3 and i had banging headache i rang back and said temp was ok but headache she aaid take painkillers and rest luckly i did but it took abit
Posts.Title: low temp

Posts.Content: I rang my bc nurse and doctor requested mri scan to see whats causing it. Bc nurse said it could be the tumour touching a nerve or the chemo touching nerves in body trappin a nerve.

Posts.Content: What was the mouthwash called?

Posts.Content: Can anyone tell me if they experienced lots of numbness and tingliness in arms and hands when they was on docetaxel chemo and also got sore mouth and throat with lumps at back of tongue.
Posts.Title: numbness on chemo

Posts.Content: I got my mri scan back and lymph nodes are smaller and everything seems ok. It sounds more like chemo doing all numbness as spine.arm.neck and brain are ok on mri scan

Posts.Content: What do you do to cope with this cause id love to know and what other side effects do u get x
Posts.Title: docetaxel effects

Posts.Content: And mine seems to come not long after.its not even 5 days x
Posts.Title: docetaxel effects

Posts.Content: The symptoms i get at mo is achy joints.i've had tight chest. Odd pains in busts.shortness of breath. Back pain.numbness in right arm and odd places round body. Anyone else had these?
Posts.Title: docetaxel effects

Posts.Content: Do u also get numbness and that plus bust hurting sometimes?
Posts.Title: docetaxel effects

Posts.Content: Getting numbness in arm and underarm on right and odd places on body
Posts.Title: docetaxel effects

Posts.Content: With docetaxel has anyone suffered from sore throat as first time I had chemo it effected my mouth and tongue and now its my throat.it started to be sore under jaw and its all my throat thats hurting now. Rung chemo and they told me to ring 111 which i then went to a walking centre and they gave me antibiotics to be on safe side
Posts.Title: docetaxel effects

Posts.Content: I know ppl get a delay just hope i dont get another one after this as still feelin crappy. Luckly not coughing rubbish up just feel like there is flem in throat. So hope they will let me have chemo and i'm ok for it xx
Posts.Title: need advice

Posts.Content: Had chemo delayed last week due to infection. Still feelin crappy but not coughing any rubbish up now. Any suggestions to make me feel better as got chemo in 2 days?
Posts.Title: need advice

Posts.Content: What I want to know is how can you not keep you self a prisoner when you can't go anywhere with crowds. Thats the thing many places contain crowds. I'm invited to a wedding but that will be in my second week of chemo. I was well looking forward to going and other people wanted me to go. I just dont know what ill do when I start
Posts.Title: risk of infection- chemo

Posts.Title: Life does go on

Posts.Content: Does anyone experience numbness feelin and that in arm and back at times. Ive had tax this thursday just gone and every so often my arm feels funny and i felt my shoulder and it feels funny too. Its hard to discribe.
Posts.Title: bit worried

Posts.Content: Keep feeling sick at times but don't know weather that's worry and that
Posts.Title: quite worried

Posts.Content: I was told I had breast cancer on 5Th July 2014. I'm getting my eggs frozen shortly but bit worried cause my lump is showing at bottom of my bust and is like a bluey purple colour and is very sore. They drained my lump first and did biopsy as they thought it was a blood clot at first. Since I bang my bust and found lump its been bruised and not gone but is showing redness in the bruising. Don't know weather this is just the fact the bruising is not healing cause of the lump but it keeps hurting. Should I tell the breast people about this before I see them next.
Posts.Title: quite worried

Posts.Content: Getting annoyed now the lump that formed underneath breast which looked like a blister after having biopsy and that keeps leaking.it completely burst about a week ago and still leaking like a yellow colour.showed them at hospital and they said it dont look infected.told them i had antibiotics nearly week ago and nearly finished them which was this Friday.Told them it keeps leakin.they dressed it and said if i dont see improvement in 7 days come back and they wil investigate.its been 4 days now and no changes.its really driving me nuts.i so hope it aint somethin real bad. If they thought it was for one sec dont you think they would have left it?
Posts.Title: quite worried

Posts.Content: Hope its nothing to bad x
Posts.Title: quite worried

Posts.Content: Phoned my breast care nurse and she assured me that its all down to anxiety and all the red bruising I have and that I had before which can be due to having biopsy and that. So she as made my mind at ease a little and the pain could be nerve touching. also sickness down to anxiety and everything that is going on
Posts.Title: quite worried

Posts.Content: Mine came from when they prodded with an instrument to drain and do biopsy as at first they thought it was a blood clot. Just wish it would stop leaking.it burst a few days ago and still leaking out of it. They saw it wednesday and re dressed it. I ended up redressing it a day after even though district nurse came following day. Had to re dress it myself last night as district nurse was on about going health centre even though my keyworker at breast clinic said it needed dressing by them . I hate doin it myself and it hurts at times
Posts.Title: quite worried

Posts.Content: Im starting chemo thursday and my breast keeps hurting.as long as this is normal ill stop worrying. What where u digonosed when got results for breast?

Posts.Title: Emotional rollercoaster

Posts.Content: Just worried as well cause since they did biopsy and drainage cause at first they thought it was a blood clot at first.It keeps leaking underneath my bust cause it formed a lump like blister. I let them look at it and they said it dont look infected but yet it wont stop leaking yellow stuff out of it. They said if it hasnt improved then come back and they will investigate. It's been 4 days and cant stop worrying.hope its newt bad xx
Posts.Title: Emotional rollercoaster

Posts.Content: Yes it is. I was dignosed with breast cancer 4th July after being told at first it was a blood clot as i banged my bust at work really hard.when i got biopsy thats when they said it was cancer 3cm lump grade 2. they checked lymphonodes which were ok and i had bone and ct scan for lung pelvis and cervix which come back ok 3 wk ago.been trying to save eggs to freeze b4 that as i have no children.sadly been only able to save one. I start chemo this thursday comin that will be for 6-9 month.its waiting to have it which is driving me nuts. Then ill have genes test that will determine what surgery i have to have done.upto now its just a masectomy then after that radiotherapy. Im so scared and hope everything goes ok as i want to do so much in life yet as im 31 x
